title: Can you put the timer on the minimap?
body:
It feels really odd that the timer is the only reason to look at the top of the screen now, and since all the other information is now on the bottom, why not go back to the old timer on the minimap idea?

We are gonna have to adjust to the new HUD anyway, so getting used to one more thing for the sake of having it all in one place seems like it'd be worth it.
